tools.name: Google Sheets
tools.description: Connects to Google Sheets for reading and writing spreadsheet data with automated synchronization

requiredParameters.sheet_name: Specific sheet name within the spreadsheet
requiredParameters.range: Cell range (e.g., A1:C10) or 'A:Z' for entire columns

tools.name: Slack
tools.description: Integrates with Slack for sending messages, notifications, and managing channels automatically

requiredParameters.channel: Slack channel name (e.g., #general) or user ID (@username)

tools.name: Gmail
tools.description: Connects to Gmail for sending emails, managing inbox, and automating email workflows

requiredParameters.subject: Email subject line
requiredParameters.from: Sender email address (optional, defaults to authenticated account)

tools.name: Notion
tools.description: Integrates with Notion workspaces for creating, updating, and managing pages and databases

requiredParameters.content: Content to add/update in the page

tools.name: Jira
tools.description: Connects to Jira for project management, issue tracking, and workflow automation

requiredParameters.issue_type: Type of issue (Bug, Task, Story, Epic)

tools.name: Webhook
tools.description: Receives HTTP callbacks from external services and triggers downstream actions

tools.name: API Call
tools.description: Makes HTTP requests to external APIs and services with configurable endpoints and parameters

tools.name: Condition
tools.description: Evaluates conditions and routes workflow execution based on specified criteria

requiredParameters.field: Field name from previous node output

tools.name: Calculation
tools.description: Performs mathematical calculations, data transformations, and statistical operations

requiredParameters.operation: Mathematical operation (add, subtract, multiply, divide, average, sum)
requiredParameters.field2: Second input field or value (for binary operations)

tools.name: Brainstorm
tools.description: Uses LLM to generate creative ideas and solutions based on provided data with specific user prompts

tools.name: Summarize
tools.description: Uses AI to condense and extract key information from large amounts of text or data

tools.name: Select
tools.description: Uses AI to choose the best option from multiple alternatives based on specified criteria

requiredParameters.options: List of options to choose from
requiredParameters.output_format: How to present the selected option

tools.name: Evaluate
tools.description: Uses AI to assess and score content, ideas, or solutions against defined parameters

tools.name: Schedule
tools.description: Triggers workflows at specified times, intervals, or based on calendar events
